message.text:
Message Of The Day (MOTD)
Welcome to the game world...

message.name: new_player
message.text: Welcome to our MUD! Please read the help files to become familiar with our rules. :)

message.name: existing_player
message.text: Welcome back! We hope you enjoy playing today.

message.name: help
message.text:
---- HELP system ----
look - look around quit - leave the game say (something) - talk to people in the current room tell (someone) (something) - talk to a single player shutdown - shut the MUD down help - this help text goto (room) - go to another room transfer (someone) [ (where) ] - transfer another player here, or to another room setflag (who) (what) - sets a flag for a player clearflag (who) (what) - clears a flag for a player

message.name: /look-longhelp
message.text:
Usage: /look
Looks around and reports back to you the name (and number) of the room you're in, a description of what you can see, and the exits from the room.

message.name: /quit-shorthelp
message.text: The end of the world as you know it.

message.name: /quit-longhelp
message.text:
Usage: /quit
Disconnects you from the game AFTER informing the server that you're doing so. It's considered a polite thing to do, if you're going away.
